name: Color Squares (VK)
description:
Color Squares is the Fun and Offline color swap game.

Play offline and enjoy yourself.

Color Squares is Fun and Easy to Play the offline game.

Switch the Color Ball Between Orange and Blue with the help of Orange and Blue Squares Also Dodge White squares and get a High Score in Endless Game.

Play offline - anytime you want as no WiFi connection is required!

Color Squares is the best game to play when you want to relax and pass the time.

Get this fun offline game for FREE.

 Game Features:

• Easy to play.

• Switch Color Ball Between Orange and Blue.

• Score and GameOver text automatic Changing Color Between Orange and Blue.

• Save Your Score.

• Endless Gameplay.

• Offline game.

How To Play:

• Tap Left Side or Right Side to Move Color Ball.

• Dodge the White Squares and get a High Score in Endless.

• Collect Orange Square to Switch Blue Color Ball or Collect Blue Square to Switch Orange Color Ball.

What are you waiting for? Download Color Squares now and start playing the most addictive color game!

Don't forget to share with your family and friends!

Good luck!
